## Kunstkraftwerk Leipzig

- ART DIRECTION, CREATIVE CODING, MOTION DESIGN

metadata.title: KUNSTKRAFTWERK LEIPZIG
metadata.summary: ART DIRECTION, CREATIVE CODING, MOTION DESIGN

slides.title: KUNST KRAFTWERK MOTION DESIGN
slides.subtitle: ART DIRECTION | CREATIVE CODING | MOTION DESIGN

Having the chance to exhibit in the immersive room of the Kunstkraftwerk in Leipzig was an amazing opportunity. I PRESENTED 'Shadow Dancers': a 5-minute generative typographic ballet in two opposite movements, a virtual Pas de Deux expressing the lack of communication in relationships.
slides.subtitle1: Filmed with real dancers, remapped through a personal creative coding algorithm, and adapted to the enormous 360° projection walls, it allowed the viewers to immerse themselves in a classical ballet experience with a very modern twist.

slides.subtitle: CREATED IN PROCESSING and then remapped in 8K resolution using Touchdesigner, the whole process was based on a few lines of codes.
slides.subtitle1: to let you enjoy playing with the ballerina, I translated the code in p5js to make it web friendly. have fun!

slides.subtitle: I am a multi-disciplinary designer in both print and digital. when many choose to focus on one discipline, i prefer working all around the field of graphic design. I do think it‘s not about how i do something, but more what and why. I have a few more motion work in this showreel, feel free to have a look.

## Liebeskind Berlin

- BRAND DESIGN, ART DIRECTION, SEASONAL ARTWORKS, SCREEN DESIGN

metadata.title: Liebeskind Berlin
metadata.summary: BRAND DESIGN, ART DIRECTION, SEASONAL ARTWORKS, SCREEN DESIGN

slides.title: LIEBESKIND BERLIN —— BRAND DESIGN
slides.subtitle: ART DIRECTION | SEASONAL ARTWORK | SCREEN DESIGN

Since its introduction to the market in 2003, Liebeskind Berlin has spread the Berlin spirit into the fashion world. In 2013, I took over the art direction from the hands of several agencies. I built a 360° graphic team, starting with B2B and progressively overtaking all visual aspects of the brand.
slides.subtitle1: BRAND GUIDELINES AND CAMPAIGN ART DIRECTION

slides.subtitle: SEASONAL GRAPHICS AND LOGOS, FOR PRODUCT DESIGN

As a Berlin brand, Liebeskind berlin wanted to do a street art collaboration. The 2020 liebeskind x stohead limited edition sold out in a few weeks. The communication, the coordination, the artworking and the collaboration with China manufactures were under my direction.

metadata.title: Salted-Beauty
metadata.summary: Brand Experience, corporate identity, UI-UX, Creative Coding, Team lead

slides.title: SALTED BEAUTY —— BRAND EXPERIENCE
slides.subtitle: ART DIRECTION | STRATEGY | PACKAGING | SCREEN DESIGN
slides.classNames: w-full h-full flex flex-col justify-center items-end font-semibold

slides.title: SALTED BEAUTY —— BRAND EXPERIENCE
slides.subtitle: Salted Beauty started a complete rebranding in summer 2021. In six month time, we updated the whole concept of the brand and adopted the new ton-of-voice. In a team of 4, we created a new brand strategy, a corporate identity, a new packaging style, a new UI/UX, a new social media content direction and we shot a complete brand campaign.

the whole brand revolves exclusively around products from the sea. We recentered the strategy on the water allegory: it is not about what the product does, but about the ingredients and their added-values. Product names have been removed to give space to the skincare process: 3+ steps for a perfect skin.

slides.title: SALTED BEAUTY —— BRAND EXPERIENCE
slides.subtitle: The grtsk variable typeface from black foundry was the focus point of the brand identity. a simple but extensive method of combining each style in a systemic way allowed a strong but versatile look and feel. the implementation of a creative coding tool to generate headlines effortlessly rounded up the typographic approach.

slides.subtitle1: UI/UX design work in progress in figma.
slides.subtitle2: instagram feed mock-up to prepare the relaunch on social media.

slides.title: Video Campaign
slides.subtitle: The campaign was shot with STUDIO-SYN from paris. Using a 6K cinematography camera only in film mode allowed us to isolate the best moments of each set-up in a very fluid and modern approach for social media and branding content.

From 30.000 INSTAGRAM followers before the rebranding, the brand doubled down on social media reaching about 71.000 followers in a few weeks. customers embraced the new look & feel slowly but steadily, leading to a stronger brand awareness and staggering sales growth.
